page.title: 14Southend:Transport
page.content:
Southend is served by two main {railway}lines into London and a large {bus service}jointly run by{Eastern {National}and{Southend Transport}the local corporation company.The graph below shows the frequency of trains on the Fenchurch Street line into London:
Time/no: 5 10 15 20 25
6.00-9.00 : |____________________(26) 9.00-12.00 : |__________ (15) 12.00-3.00 : |________ (12) 3.00-6.00 : |______________ (20) 6.00-9.00 : |_________ (14) The buses serve the whole of Southend and the surrounding area with over 70 routes travelling into or through Southend.Bus fares start at 15p and increase per stage to 30p then 43p then 55p and from then on in stages of 5p.
